hivis.data.view

Interface CollectionView<V>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Data, DataSequence, DataSeries<V>, Iterable<V>, View

    public interface CollectionView<V>
extends DataSeries<V>, View
    Interface for classes that present a view of a DataSeries.
    Author:
    O. J. Coleman

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface hivis.data.DataSeries
